website_summaries.verdict: A good Acer desktop for the money, meant for people wanting a high level of performance for most current games.
pros: Computer uses a 2TB SATA hard drive and 256GB solid state drive to maximize speed and capacity
Can be upgraded with more memory and ram if necessary
cons: The Intel i7 is a previous, older generation in the Intel Core lineup

customer_reviews.title: CPU and GPU both overheat without me constantly monitoring it and manually adjusting fans.
customer_reviews.text: On paper, it looks great. In reality, it is hot garbage. It overheats on all games that are even a little demanding (CPU overheats for Planetside 2, GPU overheats for Warframe, both GPU and CPU overheat for Destiny 2). I have to manually manage GPU and CPU temps to make sure that it isn't overheating. I SHOULD be able to pay these games with graphics at max but no. CPU overheats without VSYNC on, and I needed to download MSI Afterburner and manually set the GPU fan to ensure that it wasn't overheating with games like Destiny 2. This is an overpriced piece of crap. Do not buy if you are looking for top-end gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Owned this Acer Predator desktop PC for only 3 months ...
customer_reviews.text: Owned this Acer Predator desktop PC for only 3 months and now it's a brick. I suspect there's an issue with the motherboard. It's quite small and I think it's generating a lot of heat, especially without any heat sinks. Tried to save some time and hassle of putting together a custom gaming PC. Sending the PC back to Amazon to have it repaired since it's still under the manufacturer's warranty. Hoping they'll fix it, but my faith in Acer's quality has gone down significantly. Wont be buying anything Acer anytime soon or ever.
customer_reviews.author: Jon-Eric

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to any gamer that does not want to ...
customer_reviews.text: The Acer Predator has lived up to its name. I am a gamer and when I got this desktop i wanted to test it out on my fps games. It runs over 200 fps in almost all of my games. Including Counter Strike Global Offensive, H1z1, All Call of Duty games, and a lot more. I would recommend this to any gamer that does not want to build their own computer and wants a prebuild. I got it with no problems and it works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Upgradable and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Got this as my first gaming PC years ago. Mine came with a i7-6700 and a GTX 950. It surprisingly ran most games well, like Fortnite and CS. I eventually upgraded to a GTX 1060 which is great, also added a SSD. Ended up trading my brother who got a steal on Facebook Marketplace because I'm trying to make it big on the interwebs. Great guy, anyways, it's upgradable, and it'll put some peach fuzz on that little console carmelo of yours. GG no re :D
customer_reviews.author: Failumni on YouTube :)

customer_reviews.title: ( still works great just not a fan of those temps
customer_reviews.text: ive had it for only 3 days, and can see it gets quite hot. this pc doesnt even have a dedicated exhaust fan on this model. expect 75 celcius and up on the gpu and 72 celcius on the cpu :( still works great just not a fan of those temps.
customer_reviews.author: brandon benard

customer_reviews.title: Arrived fine and initially in good order
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fine and initially in good order, but the computer would not respond correctly after an hour or so of use. Acer support offered to return ship and repair it, but I was able to correct the issue by properly seating a loose RAM card. Everything has been fine and works as promised since then. Very fast, has an HDMI output - this is a great performer with all current games and apps.
customer_reviews.author: Army88

customer_reviews.title: Acer Predator i7 16gb ram
customer_reviews.text: This is the fastest computer I've ever owned. It was well worth the purchase price. It is surprisingly quiet and runs World of Warcraft perfectly. I haven't tried any graphics intensive games yet but so far I am pleased. Hopefully this PC will last me for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for gaming and very good customer service
customer_reviews.text: For my first gaming PC I was AMAZED by how great this one is, I was expecting way less from what I got. But there are 2 tiny things that could've been better in this case. First, the motherboard, I am not trying to say the mother board is bad or not working well or anything like that, but the BIOS could've been way better. Second, DUST, keeping this piece of art clean is a nightmare. Very worth it, amazing temperatures and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... computer for about 8 months now and it runs great. A lot of the time I leave it ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this computer for about 8 months now and it runs great. A lot of the time I leave it on over night (I know it's not good but it's on accident) and it's perfectly fine. Lots of usb ports which is awesome and a disc reader as well which a lot of computers don't have. I use this to play games and it runs them smoothly although I do tend to lower graphics quality just to gain more fps. Still runs on high graphics, I just prefer fps over that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product had a bad processor I had to mail it back and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Product had a bad processor I had to mail it back and the front cover was broken which is not covered by warranty. Now I have it back and it runs great but cover is still broken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I did bump it to 48GB and it was tricky with the heatsink in the way but still solid and a great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a little compact on the inside and the removable drive caddy does not fit a SSD well. However with all of that it is silent and a monster of power. I did bump it to 48GB and it was tricky with the heatsink in the way but still solid and a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shiva

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend this Gaming Computer
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome computer! We bought it for our son July 2016, he only wanted this for gaming. He plays games such as RPG's, Turn Base Strategies and RTS. He was not able to play these on regular PC's and this has worked out perfect for him. Definitely, recommend this computer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One thing I hate is when a pc
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pc a couple of years ago. I have not had one problem with it that I did not cause myself. I runs everything I throw. I play everything on the highest settings. One thing I hate is when a pc, or console makes a lot of noise, and this rig makes no noticeable noises. I honestly have no cons for this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great machine if you’re willing to pay
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about a year now and it still runs as fast as the day I got it. Handles everything I throw at at it with ease and speed. I would highly recommend to anyone who can get one while on sale. I would pay full price because there’s other options that are cheaper. That’s honestly the only reason I’m not giving 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Miguel E.

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars plus
customer_reviews.text: Great computer; Set up was quick and easy. Performance has been great. It has handled everything I have thrown at it. I would definitely recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Hoppe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing computer, but...
customer_reviews.text: It's an absolutely amazing computer, but I'm only giving four stars because certain parts are pretty flimsy. Headphone jack broke in a month-ish )':
customer_reviews.author: Catt

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME. My hubby and I play WoW and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish it came with a permanent word processing program. Other than that, AWESOME. My hubby and I play WoW and the speed, graphics and sound are terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Redmond

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product. Runs my flight simulator x with PMDG add ons very smooth
customer_reviews.author: Saad Sheikh

customer_reviews.title: The case layout could be better but I love this animal
customer_reviews.text: The case layout could be better but I love this animal. Boots up lightning fast and it runs several of my virtual machines without breaking a sweat
customer_reviews.author: A. King

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gaming pc. Great gaming pc choice if you want a very nicely built pc and you don't want to build your own. Had it for a while and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Someone on Slickdeals.net posted the i7 when it was 850. I pulled the trigger and I am extremely satisfied with this powerhouse.
customer_reviews.author: edward constantin

customer_reviews.title: works like a charm for what i bought it for
customer_reviews.text: works like a charm for what i bought it for, good for gaming low/med settings. Can use high settings but i like more fps in games.
customer_reviews.author: Brinny K.

customer_reviews.title: given as a gift, works well per son able ...
customer_reviews.text: given as a gift, works well per son able to play all the games so far that have been purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Becca M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, dont give 5 star because the A key on the keyboard sticks a little bit
customer_reviews.author: Emidio Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The desktop is every thing i need it runs a little hot but it still works
customer_reviews.author: Canyon

customer_reviews.title: I like it - pretty solid so far One issue that ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it - pretty solid so far One issue that bothers me ( I haven't tried to see if there is a solution yet) When the computer goes in sleep mode -- it disconnects from my wifi
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent system, works perfectly!! The shipping was extra fast as well. I am highly impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup. I'm not using it for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Fast computer with multi monitor configuration (4). Easy setup. I'm not using it for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Z.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quiet PC. Handles EPIC-Paragon and BLIZZARD Overwatch very well.
customer_reviews.author: BKL

customer_reviews.title: Sold performane for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Solid so far, no issues setting it up, good gaming performance on high to max settings for games like Battlefield 4, GTA5, Ark Survival Evolved and Fallout 4
customer_reviews.author: Col Chobo

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it!! although 3 days out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Kid loves it!! although 3 days out of the box it has internal disk error and lost all connection ports!! thank goodness for return/replacement policy!!
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: First acer bought
customer_reviews.text: Package good and sealed, fast shipping for expedited. Fast and reliable can't wait to test on 3rd memo games. First acer product ever bought for myself. I am satisfied on this desktop thank you for choosing me as a customer acer!!. I recommend this desktop. No issues yet make sure to update everything first.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: it is not bad but it is nothing like i thought it would ...
customer_reviews.text: it is not bad but it is nothing like i thought it would be. When try the TURBO / overclock it shuts down. There is not enough power supply i would have put a much bigger power supply in it.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: The base stats work just fine for the games I do play with now
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for two weeks now and I have experienced no problems with it so far. I haven't messed with the system stats so far and I don't think I will. I am not as hardcore a gamer as I used to be so overclocking won't do much for me. The base stats work just fine for the games I do play with now.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Dead Predator
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 1 year. Red light on the front face plate keeps flashing when plugged in but that's all that happens now. Will not boot. Completely unresponsive. Not impressed given the cost of this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in time and worked perfectly since start. It runs semi quite, just a low sound fan. I was able to run World of Warcraft and Guild Wars 2 on it on ultra without any problems and 60+ frames per second (FPS). Overall, I am very happy with my purchase, it's a low priced pc with premium quality in my newbie opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Abdulhadi

customer_reviews.title: Best Around
customer_reviews.text: Was a great purchase. price was best I found anywhere. It arrived in less time than expected and has been working flawlessly. I've since installed a ssd and the speed of this thing is amazing. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Very nice computer!
customer_reviews.text: A very nice computer, had a bit of an issue with the wifi not working and crashing, but once it was connected by Ethernet cable, everything was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fooled by the bells and whistles
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box it has too many driver issues. Predator Sensor Crash in the heat of a game or during activation. You should not have to reconfigure drivers and applications on a ready to use rig. The graphic card does not allow proper updates. It not worth the money that it is sold for. I waited too long to return it. Not a very good purchase on my part.
customer_reviews.author: Typos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is a great gaming computer. very colorful and my 12 year loves it.
customer_reviews.author: jesse s

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: So far it has ran over watch great and as for some of the other reviews most issues stated can be solved by updating the software out of the box same as any computer make sure your connected to the Internet during set up
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Gaming Computer at AMAZING price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing gaming computer, so far it's been able to run EVERY game I've tried well at max settings, including Fallout 4, GTA V, and CSGO, all with good framerate. I'd definatly recomend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: The computer works great it runs my all my games at max settings ...
customer_reviews.text: The computer works great it runs my all my games at max settings at 60 fps.The pc also doesn't crash and it is easy to install more ram. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: gavin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good unit. the digital manual needs improving.Not enough detail on unit inside.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J Peluso

customer_reviews.title: Great graphics, runs most graphically intense games
customer_reviews.text: Great graphics, runs most graphically intense games, gets hot when on for too long. I would definitely recommend an additional coolant of some sort. I love it, though! No VGA port for monitors. HDMI & DVI compatible.
customer_reviews.author: Joi

customer_reviews.title: Completely Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Had the computer for a week and a half and the motherboard is already messing up. Complete waste of money. Returning it and building my own.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding Gaming machine for the money. Well built and very quiet machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great PC to buy
customer_reviews.text: This PC is very powerful, it can run any thing of games but the any thing about this is that the keyboard that they sent me it's not working and I don't know how to contact them about this. So I will give this a 3 star because the keyboard don't work.
customer_reviews.author: EdwardsCode

customer_reviews.title: This is the absolutely worst computer I have ever seen
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolutely worst computer I have ever seen. DVD player does not work. There are constant problems with Windows 10. It seems to be nothing but problems. I can not make support services understand or fix the problems. Do not buy this computer!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It runs great, no complaints. Just wish it had a beefier video card. The 950 is OK.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product really gave me some bad experience. It comes with deactived HDMI port and ...
customer_reviews.text: The product really gave me some bad experience. It comes with deactived HDMI port and no regular vga port. I am not able to connect it to my monitor. Not sure if I am the only one having this problem and I am suprise no one metioned it here.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: The computer is pretty good in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: The computer is pretty good in my opinion. One thing i would like to point out though is that the price is kinda high, however other than that, everything is awesome. Worth buying? You decide.
customer_reviews.author: Jin

product_meta.title: Acer Predator Desktop, Intel Core i7, GeForce GTX 1080, 16GB DDR4, 256GB SSD, 2TB HDD, Win 10, AG6-710-70016
product_meta.description: Size:16GB RAM / 2TB HDD + 256GB SSD| Style:Intel Core i7 - NVIDIA GTX 1080Acer Predator AG6-710-70016 Desktop PC comes with these specs: 6th Generation Intel Core i7-6700K processor 4.0GHz with Turbo Boost Technology up to 4.2GHz, Windows 10 Home, 16GB DDR4 2133MHz Memory, NVIDIA GeForce GTX1080 Graphics with 8GB of GDDR5X Video Memory, 16X DVD±R/RW SuperMulti Drive, 256GB SSD, 2TB 7200RPM SATA III Hard Drive, Digital Media Card Reader -Secure Digital (SD) Card, Creative Sound Blaster X-Fi MB5, 2 - USB 2.0 Ports (Rear), 6 - USB 3.0 Ports (2 Front & 4 Rear), 1 - HDMI Port, 1 - DVI Port, 3 - Display Ports, 10/100/1000 (Gigabit) LAN (RJ-45 Port), 802.11ac WiFi, Bluetooth 4.0 LE, Predator Flare Mechanical USB Gaming Keyboard and Mouse, 34.4 lbs. | 15.6 kg (system unit only), 2 Year Parts and Labor Limited Warranty with Toll Free Tech Support (UD.P01AA.406)
feature_bullets: 6th Generation Intel Core i7-6700K processor 4.0GHz (up to 4.2GHz)
NVIDIA GeForce GTX1080 Graphics with 8GB of GDDR5X Video Memory
